remarks: Shifting a closed-below, open-above interval is one-to-one onto. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)
statement:
icoshftf1o.1 $e |- F = ( x e. ( A [,) B ) |-> ( x + C ) ) $.
icoshftf1o $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> F : ( A [,) B ) -1-1-onto-> ( ( A + C ) [,) ( B + C ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
